body.name: ZINUS Alexia Wood with Wood Headboard Bed Frame with headboard / Solid Wood Foundation with Wood Slat Support / No Box Spring Needed / Easy Assembly, Rustic Pine, Queen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: SUPPORTIVE AND STYLISH SLEEP - The perfect spot to begin and end your days, the Alexia Wood with Wood Headboard Bed with headboard adorns any interior with rustic, timeless charm and excellent mattress support.Maximum weight recommendation:700 pounds
NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Reliable and closely spaced wood slats are designed to support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring

DURABLE DESIGN - A thick and sturdy solid wood frame is constructed with steel interior framework for longevity; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 700 lbs
EASY ASSEMBLY - All parts, tools and instructions are shipped straight to your door in one efficiently packed box for simple set-up that takes less than an hour with a friend’s help
Worry-free 5-year limited warranty included; mattress sold separately
body.description: So much more than just a sturdy support system for your beloved mattress, the Alexia with Wood Headboard Bed Frame with headboard will charm any bedroom it adorns. This soundly built foundation features a genuine solid wood frame with a rustic finish and unique, natural wood knots and patterns. And to help you eliminate the box spring once and for all, it’s crafted with a set of wood slats engineered to support and extend the life of any mattress you rest upon it. It’s also reinforced with steel for extra durability that’ll have you snoozing soundly for many nights to come. The entire bed is cleverly shipped in one box that arrives at your doorstep with all the tools, parts and instructions you need to assemble it in under an hour. Plus, it includes extra confidence for you to rest even easier in the form of a 5-year worry-free warranty. Once you kick back on top of this sturdy with Wood Headboard, you’ll probably wonder why you didn’t upgrade to such a classy, dependable frame even sooner. That is, until you drift off to dreamland in no time at all.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rustic charm Timeless style Beautiful natural wood details, a stylish headboard, and a solidly built frame make the Alexia Platform Bed the perfect place to rest your head. Whether you’re going for a farmhouse aesthetic or a more modern feel, Alexia adds charm to any bedroom.

Thoughtfully designed Room for storage With 8.46” of clearance underneath, you’ll have plenty of space to store your odds and ends. No box spring needed Wood slats spaced evenly apart (3.5” king and queen beds, 3.07” full and twin) provide all the support your favorite mattress needs without a box spring.

It’s all in the details Solid wood headboard Made from real solid wood—no MDF or particleboard here—the stylish headboard features a rustic pine finish that shows off the natural beauty of the wood frame.

Choosing the right bed frame Standard With a thinner wood frame than the Deluxe, the standard frame offers an additional 2” of clearance space underneath—8.46” total—plenty of room for storing your odds and ends. Deluxe Thicker wood pieces in the frame and headboard provide added stability and support to the bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid bed at reasonable price, better than Ikea
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit uncertain when ordering this bed, after I received it and assembled, it's a great buy. It's well packaged, just right not over packaged. Made of real wood, not MDF, the slats are plywood, that's fine. All parts are well built, comes with clear instructions, and all parts are number labeled, that makes it super easy to assemble. It even comes with a few extra hardware, very thoughtful. I particularly like the way that the slats are attached to the bed, so they won't randomly move when you putting mattress on the bed. Overall it's really good at the price, better than Ikea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took me 5 years to finally pull the trigger on a bed
reviews.reviewText: ***6 month updateStill an awesome bedframe. Still the same solid, uncreakable, unbreakable bed that came in the annoyingly secure box in July 2022. I will ABSOLUTELY purchase another when I buy a home. Affordable, stylish, sturdy, reliable. Money is tight these days and this purchase won't make you feel like an idiot for trusting that something so affordable can actually be a decent item for ownership.I'm a researcher---and I don't like spending money on stuff that is misrepresented, and I'll sure as heck send it back. I travel around a lot because of education and work--so my "bed frame" was a cheap wallyworld metal frame that a nice mattress sat upon. Looked terrible, but there it is.This bed was extraordinarily affordable, which gave me pause. It came in a huge, long cardboard container---and was packed so carefully I was annoyed at how much wrapping I had to undo. So it came in pristine condition.I laid out all of the pieces, which are marked clearly with numbers and letters, all of the hardware is in a packet that has corresponding numbers and letters. EASY PEASY. The pieces all fit together without any further "modification" and I had it together within an hour by myself. All tools included.The finish is very nice. I got the Rustic Pine---and it is NICE. Not too dark, not blonde...just a golden, creamy color much like honey oak but a little more ash. My decor is mission---and this is why I chose this bed. It fits perfectly.I am 5'6" and weigh 145lbs. I have not had a squeak, creak, or wobble. Not one. I have a 110 lb dog that jumps up, so a second "person" is also on the bed. No movement. No cracking or breaking or nonsense like these others are saying. ***first off, please be specific about your weight and activities when you claim the bed "broke and cracked". I can guarantee---you're putting >500lbs onto this bed and then expecting it to act like a steel frame while you do tandem acrobatics. It's nonsensical from what I see in this frame---especially if you're of a healthy weight. If you want to put >500lbs or even close to that on a frame....BUY A STEEL FRAME.There is a nice 8 inch clearance underneath where I have stored several suitcases and some other items. The height of the bed is PERFECT for me--I can imagine it may seem a little low for someone over 6', but otherwise, it's just a nice height.I've had the bed for a month now---and I stand by my initial impression---STURDY (when you're not putting a 2 ton wrecking ball to it) and very pretty. Easy construction and very clear instructions on how to do that.For those that are gonna sit there and measure the distance between slats....seriously. You need to focus that energy on solving world hunger. Really. Seriously. Nobody actually cares.I would buy this again for an additional room if/when I have one. Very nice for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, well made for the money
reviews.reviewText: This really surprised me. First, the bed frame was packaged very well. Lots of foam yo protect the wood. The screws were all on a card, labeled, and plastic sealed. It was built well. All the screws aligned perfectly and well. The instructions were simple. No words, but huge well thought out diagrams showing each step with a number and a diagram of each screw for each step. Very easy to read and assemble. The kit not only included the necessary Allan wrench, but also has a small ratchet tool. I was impressed! It looks great and us very sturdy. My only thing, is that I would have liked to see the headboard taller...but that's just my personal preference and nothing to do with the quality of the product. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am coming from a King size metal bed frame so switching to wood I was concerned about putting the frame together and the quality supporting my mattress without having to buy from a large furniture store.I read all the reviews and saw that that is frame had such great stars. The price point was wonderful under $200.Fast forward to delivery. I was in luck and home when the truck pulled up so I was able to ask the guys to place the box in my garage.First impression when I tried to reposition the box was, wow the reviews are true the quality of this bed must be amazing because I couldn’t move the box for nothing, it is VERY heavy!I had to open the box and bring each piece in 1 x 1, and the quality is crème de la crème!It’s beautiful pine. It smells amazing, feels amazing. It’s a gorgeous frame. I wish the headboard were a bit higher, but even down the slats and how they are buckled it with wood grooves, it’s a very well made bed.Instructions were great, and tools and pieces were great quality. I cannot believe this bed sells for $200 as a King size.

Not only is it easy to build, but it's so well-organized that it's impossible to mess up! It's so sturdy, and looks great! Really pleasantly surprised by it. It's light years better than any Ikea bedframe you can get. There are little attention to detail points on it that are so nice as well. The velcro to hold down the slats perfectly, the sticky-pads to keep the mattress in place. All really nice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality for a great price
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this bed in a king size a few years ago and are so pleased that we purchased a queen for our new guest bedroom. The bed is durable, looks amazing and was sooo easy to put together. We coupled it with a Molblly queen mattress ... now we just need guests!

The Zinus 12 Inch Wood Platform Bed offers a perfect blend of style, durability, and functionality for your bedroom. Crafted with solid wood slats and a cherry finish, this platform bed frame provides reliable support and a modern aesthetic. The 12-inch height eliminates the need for a box spring, making it an economical choice while also creating extra storage space under the bed. The sturdy construction ensures stability and long-lasting performance. The wood slats allow for proper air circulation, enhancing mattress lifespan and preventing mold or mildew formation. The Queen size provides ample room for individuals or couples, while the easy assembly process saves time and effort. The Zinus 12 Inch Wood Platform Bed combines practicality and elegance to create a comfortable and stylish focal point in your bedroom.

It looks great in person, price was reasonable.Assembly was easy. Instructions provided were easy to followI have been using it for over a month, feels quite sturdy. Wood finishing looks very good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy, Beautiful and Cheap would recommend to anyone!
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was SO easy to put together, took me under an hour to get everything unpacked and put together. The pieces are well labeled, the instructions are easy to follow and the pieces are light but very well made. Some of the features I really liked was the slats that act as the box spring actually velcro to the bed frame so you don't have them moving around or falling through like other beds. This is so smart and defintiley one of the highlights that made me so satisfied with this purchase. On the top of these slats there is two long sticky pads which holds the mattress in place so it doesn't move around either. The bed frame is ridiculously sturdy, I'm talking like not even moving an cm let alone banging against a wall or creaking. I was also really impressed with the quality and colour of the wood. After reading some reviews some said it wasn't true to the picture but I disagree I think it was just what I expected. If you're looking for a wood bedframe wayfair's prices are upwards of 700$ and after comparing nearly every site from jysk, to ikea, to wayfair and overstock this was defintiley the cheapest wood frame for its style. Its lived up to all my expectations and I am so thrilled with it. The only thing I would want someone else to know is that if you have a really thick mattress alot of the headboard will be covered by it.
